Hip-Hop Artists

Kendrick Lamar

Genre: Hip-Hop

Albums: To Pimp a Butterfly, DAMN., good kid, m.A.A.d city

Bio: Kendrick Lamar Duckworth is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer.

J. Cole

Genre: Hip-Hop

Albums: 2014 Forest Hills Drive, KOD, Born Sinner

Bio: Jermaine Lamarr Cole, known professionally as J. Cole, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer.

Drake

Genre: Hip-Hop

Albums: Scorpion, Views, Take Care

Bio: Aubrey Drake Graham is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter, and actor.
